versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Generates landing page content

schema.prompt:
Create comprehensive landing page content based on:

Campaign Theme: {{input.campaignTheme}}
Key Features: {{input.keyFeatures}}
Benefits: {{input.benefits}}
Slogans: {{input.slogans}}
Call-to-Actions: {{input.callToActions}}
Target Conversion: {{input.targetConversion}}

Generate complete landing page content:

1. Hero Section:
   - Primary headline (power statement)
   - Secondary headline (benefit clarification)
   - Hero description (2-3 sentences)
   - Primary CTA button text
   - Supporting visual description

2. Value Proposition Section:
   - Clear value statement
   - 3-5 key benefits
   - Differentiation points
   - Risk reduction elements
   - Credibility indicators

3. Features & Benefits:
   - Feature headlines
   - Benefit explanations
   - Icon/visual suggestions
   - Proof points
   - Use case examples

4. Social Proof Section:
   - Testimonial framework
   - Customer success stories
   - Statistics/numbers
   - Trust badges
   - Company logos

5. How It Works:
   - Step-by-step process
   - Timeline expectations
   - Simplicity emphasis
   - Getting started guide

6. Objection Handling:
   - FAQ section
   - Common concerns
   - Risk reversal
   - Guarantee language
   - Support promises

7. Urgency & Scarcity:
   - Limited time offers
   - Exclusive access
   - Countdown elements
   - Stock limitations
   - Bonus incentives

8. Multiple CTAs:
   - Primary action buttons
   - Secondary CTAs
   - Exit-intent CTAs
   - Mobile-optimized CTAs
   - Contextual placements

9. Footer Content:
   - Company information
   - Contact details
   - Privacy/terms links
   - Additional resources
   - Alternative actions

10. Conversion Optimization:
    - A/B test suggestions
    - Friction reduction
    - Form optimization
    - Page flow logic
    - Mobile considerations

Return as structured JSON with keys: headlines (object with primary/secondary), bodyContent (object by section), testimonialFramework (object), ctaVariations (array), socialProofElements (array), objectionHandling (array), urgencyElements (object), conversionOptimization (object).

props.placeholder: Main features to highlight on the page
Desired user actions (sign up, buy, download)
Primary goal for visitors (purchase, lead, signup)

translations.description: Generates comprehensive landing page content optimized for conversions
translations.instructions: Enter your campaign theme and key elements. The system will create complete landing page content including headlines, sections, and conversion optimization elements.
translations.name: Landing Page Content Generator
